summary: Heironymus Merkin (Anthony Newley) screens an autobiographical movie of his life, growth, and moral decay.
cast: Anthony Newley|Joan Collins|Alexander Newley|Tara Newley Arkle|Milton Berle|Connie Kreski|George Jessel|Bruce Forsyth|Patricia Hayes|Stubby Kaye|Ronald Rubin|Louis Negin|Tom Stern|Ronald Radd|Rosalind Knight|Victor Spinetti|Julian Orchard|Judy Cornwell|Desmond Walter-Ellis|Bernard Stone|Margaret Nolan|Yolanda|Sally Douglas|Roy Desmond|Lynda Baron|Joyce Blair|Bruce Boa|Robin Bullivant|Berry Cornish|Gilly Grant|Mike Higgins|Isobel Hurll|Robert Hutton|Laurie Leigh|Aleta Morrison|Eve Pearce|John Poore|Margo Segrave|Sue Shepherd|Muriel Young
keywords: autobiographical|written and directed by cast member|absurd|question mark in title|musical number
title: Can Heironymus Merkin Ever Forget Mercy Humppe and Find True Happiness?
